name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Darrells ReLoader - A simple page reload

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically reloads the current tab based on the user set in the amount of seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just a straight forward and easy to use extension to reload the current tab being used.
